nodes.text: Kilmo was a male active in Coronet City on the planet Corellia during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In the year 13 BBY, Kilmo encountered fellow criminal Han Solo and left him with bruising beneath his left eye.

Kilmo was first identified in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo. Although he was stated to be human in Solo: A Star Wars Story: Expanded Edition by Mur Lafferty, when he later appeared in the first issue of the Marvel comic adaptation of Solo: A Star Wars Story, Kilmo was depicted as an alien.
